code:
%%{Logistics_DeliveryRoute}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant User as User Browser
    participant API as Drogon API Pod
    participant DB as PostgreSQL

    Note over User, API: 1. Registration
    User->>API: POST /register
    API->>API: Hash password
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO users
    DB-->>API: Returns User ID
    API-->>User: 201 Created {Logistics_FleetManagement}

    Note over User, API: 2. Create Short Link
    User->>API: POST /shorten (Logistics_StockLevel)
    API->>API: Validate & Generate Code
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO links
    DB-->>API: OK
    API-->>User: 201 Created {Logistics_DeliveryRoute}

    Note over User, API: 3. Redirect
    User->>API: GET /{Logistics_FleetManagement}
    API->>DB: SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...
    DB-->>API: Return Destination URL
    API-->>User: 302 Found (Logistics_Warehouse)

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，User Browser、Drogon API Pod就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含PostgreSQL、POST /register这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Hash password、INSERT INTO users？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下POST /shorten (Logistics_StockLevel)、Validate & Generate Code吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达POST /shorten (Logistics_StockLevel)、Validate & Generate Code结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: GET /{Logistics_FleetManagement}、SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达GET /{Logistics_FleetManagement}、SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在GET /{Logistics_FleetManagement}、SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...完成整个流程。
